entity.name: File_relationship
entity.description: A File_relationship is a relationship between two File objects. It specifies that the related File is referenced from the relating File. A service manual may contain graphics for explanatory reasons. In this case the File objects that contain the graphics are referenced as related from the File object that contains the body of the service manual with relation_type 'reference'.

explicit.name: relation_type
description
explicit.description: The description specifies additional information about the File_relationship.

explicit.name: relating_document_file
explicit.description: The related specifies the first of the two Files related by the File_relationship.

explicit.name: related_document_file
explicit.description: The related specifies the second of the two Files related by the File_relationship.
